name: sole-archive
description: Academic digital archive and research discovery platform for ConSOLE proceedings

scripts.prebuild: python scripts/build_related_slugs.py && mkdir -p public && copy src/content/papers.json public/papers.json 2> NUL || cp src/content/papers.json public/papers.json
scripts.deploy: npm run prebuild && echo > dist/.nojekyll && npm run build && gh-pages -d dist -b gh-pages
